get.bash: iw dev | grep ssid | head -1 | xargs | cut -b 6-
iwlist wlan0 scanning | grep ESSID | grep -v '""' | grep -v '\x' | sed 's/^[ \t]*ESSID:"//' | sed 's/"$//' | sort | uniq
nmap -sn "$(ip route | awk '/default/ {print $3}' | head -1)"/24 -oG - | grep 'Status: Up'
iw dev | grep Interface | head -1 | xargs | cut -b 11-
